Row.Text: Viking Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Stave Church and Longhouse in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on each Gold adjacency from Rivers. Ageless.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on each Gold adjacency from Rivers.
Grants a Great Work Slot. Grants a Great Work Slot. Grants a Great Work Slot. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for each adjacent Forest and Taiga Tile. Ageless.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. 1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Coastal Tile.
Viking Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Naust and Fishing Quay in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on each Gold adjacency from Coast. Ageless.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on each Gold adjacency from Coast.
+3[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Resource. Restores movement to any Viking Unit at its location. Ageless. Must be placed on an on Coast or Navigable River.
